name: Last Ride
description:
Do you like Trains?
Some people certainly do!

I think you will enjoy this Train Ride, too!

But is it an ordinary Train Ride? I don't know... Maybe something is afoot...
Come and find out where this Train is actually heading!
Navigate the train and talk to people to see what lies
behind...

In this short atmospherical Game you play as a Character on a Train Ride
which takes unusually long. It is in your hands to try to get behind that.

- Walk around and discover your surroundings!
- Talk with people!
- Collect Stuff!
- And find out what the hell is going on...
